channel.title: [req] death rune buyer [req]
channel.description: ok i need a death rune buyer i tried lookin for one but i couldnt find one so ..if someone has one can u please post it thx ;)

item.title: [req] death rune buyer [req]

item.description:
@charlie121 wrote:

A ghost mouse is a programm that record your mouse movment. all you have to do is search on www.google.co.uk ghost mouse download it. then record what you want to do E.G buying deaths record your self buying 100 then play the program over and over. hope I helped

item.title: [req] death rune buyer [req]
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

darkilla:

umm ok try your best dude and thx

I have the perfect Deathrune Buyer just for you!

[code]/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// //
// Dudeofthed’s AutoDeathRune Buyer //
// This has Anti-Ban with random mouse movements //
// Please Enjoy. //
// //
// Credits go to: //
// Darkilla - For requesting this script! //
// Janibaloo - For creating a Scar Tut list. //
// MoparIsTheBest - For making MoparIsTheBest.com and it’s community //
// //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program Deathrune_Buyer;

var
Deathrune, Buy, x, y: Integer;

procedure LoadBmps;
begin
Deathrune := BitmapFromString(23, 13, ‘z78DAADD44B9284200C’ +
‘06E02B0109792C11E4FE471ADA648145E3F43CB42AE5C2C2CF3F0’ +
‘12A942871A6468D3B1393441616012E5CBC1257AE227C721395C0’ +
‘DDEA99CF34EEA56A180BB0261997662952BCB2543954E494A665B’ +
‘CD5B569D2544059992A21A14B1AE3B82FCF1B957956D52149A2D7’ +
‘2628205DB2E48F3C55A386925555E8A471B9E460E0E47552AD7FB’ +
‘D4B69F56C7333CF954C211D4F1472C9C53D4C9DCE1154E4307B76’ +
‘ABB9EA775D9B922932B2A9B965CECC8194D493593D577DF67CA35’ +
‘DBB669D32491C1F1F238280E09E44071D5EFF49B5766D4DC6E604’ +
‘113A743C71BCE4C9CC929DE783AE6D3D6B325D5131BCAE88112AD’ +
‘44CD8B1FBCCACAACBF3971ECD9D7289EDE56B07DD24110F2C37C9’ +
‘E4795EFF07B33D2733EDEBC13B01CC339E143403366C76CECCAAA’ +
‘D61E9DABAF76FBB7E333337C9010464336333EC9E4975333C4EF5’ +
‘ACF2B3D124EBA978A94CF2C6637BCA260772CDD524CF53B49BED9’ +
‘B6A3AB7ED8B3E219364F6CCFDC2F28AC4BAE65931450AE699856F’ +
‘9C1BA1AF1FD2B8AD7E01D23990E1’);

Buy := BitmapFromString(40, 11, ‘z78DAE5954B0E80200C05AFE’ +
‘402E2050CF73F928B6E489E6D0653056317C420E29B7E5BBBB67A’ +
‘D452F6D556AED023B2E7ADB335A955BFA98D4F2A917E4BEE9C4BE’ +
‘A69D3B75FE4B5559513DED8639E7FE2DAC9DA1F8D35E1D5CAE5F5’ +
‘3B9A0F4FE4CF3DDE383766EDE7F2F6F1FA0FEFFBFA4997C8E2E5F’ +
‘388F42B321D3C0D5E7F20BC442D9FD7B1C5D3819F1F8D11FF23F7’ +
‘B3D90949AB60E3’);
end;

procedure FindDeathrune;
begin
if(FindBitmap(Deathrune,x,y))then
Wait(500)
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y +random(0),20,40,45,25,20);
Wait(200)
ClickMouse(x,y,False);
Wait(500)
end;

procedure FindBuy;
begin
if(FindBitmap(Buy,x,y))then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y +random(0),20,40,45,50,55);
Wait(500)
ClickMouse(x,y,True);
end;

begin
repeat
LoadBmps;
FindDeathrune;
FindBuy;
Until(False);
end.[/code]

That is the DeathRune buyer for you. I told ya i will edit this post.

P.S Do you want anything else added to the script instead of just buying death runes. Because i can edit it to add anything else.[br][size=1]Posted on: 10-03-2007, 04:10:48[/size][hr]Have you used it yet? Is it good?

Please post as much feedback if it doesn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: [req] death rune buyer [req]
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

[code]program New;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
var
Money: boolean;
Value: boolean;
z: integer;
i: integer;
c: integer;
d: integer;
RuneValueint: integer;
ChatChars: integer;
ServerChars: integer;
RuneChars: integer;
FireMin: integer;
MindMin: integer;
AirMin: integer;
WaterMin: integer;
EarthMin: integer;
ChaosMin: integer;
DeathMin: integer;
FireNum: integer;
MindNum: integer;
AirNum: integer;
WaterNum: integer;
EarthNum: integer;
ChaosNum: integer;
DeathNum: integer;
RuneValue: string;
a: string;
b: string;

Procedure Login;
begin
Mouse(652,304,140,30,true)
Wait(200+random(300))
TypeSend(‘UserName’)
Wait(200+random(300))
TypeSend(‘password’)
Wait(200+random(300))
Mouse(495,334,134,30,true)
Wait(200+random(300))
repeat
Wait(500+ random(500))
until(FindColor(x,y,331877,537,324,755,403) = true)
Mouse(537,324,210,70,true)
Wait(1000+ random(500))
end;

Procedure SelectWorldMenu;
begin
Wait(500+random(500))
Mouse(525,12,50,5,true)
Wait(1000+random(500))
Mouse(565,500,65,14,true)
Wait(4000+random(1000))
end;

Procedure SelectServer;
begin
i:=0
repeat
wait(500+random(500))
b:= inttostr(i)
writeln(b)
until(IsTextInAreaEx(424,397,522,957,x,y,‘World’,0,ServerChars,false,false,0,0,4243600)= true)

repeat
If z < 88 then
begin
writeln(‘server number too low, resetting’)
z:= 138
end;
z:= z - 1
a:= inttostr(z)
writeln(a)
until(IsTextInAreaEx(424,397,522,957,x,y,a,0,ServerChars,false,false,0,0,4243600)= true);
wait(1000)
Mouse(x,y,5,5,true);
repeat
Wait(1000)
i:= i + 1
WriteLn(inttostr(i));
until(FindColor(x,y,65535,568,268,720,284) = true)
end;

Procedure ScreenSetup;
begin
wait(2000+random(500))
HighestAngle
Wait(500+random(200))
GameTab(4)
end;

Procedure TradeBetty;
begin
repeat
MMouse(0,510,775,0)
If FindColorTolerance(x,y,5834842,3,3,513,335,10) = true then;
begin
Wait(100)
MMouse(x,y,4,4)
end;
Wait(100 + random (100))
until (IsUpTextMulti(‘Betty’,‘ett’,‘tty’)= true);
Getmousepos(x,y)
ClickMouse(x,y,false)
wait(1000+random(500))
x:= x -45
y:= y + 36
Mouse(x,y,25,9,true)
wait(2500 + random(500))
end;

Procedure BuyMind;
begin
WriteLn(‘Starting Mind routine’)
Value:= true
repeat

wait(200)
RuneValue:= Trim(GetTextAtEx(267,68,0,RuneChars,false,false,0,2,65535,4,true,tr_AllChars));
RuneValueint:= strtoint(RuneValue)
Wait(200)
If RunevalueInt > MindMin then
begin
Value:= true
end else
begin
Value:= false
end;

If value = true then
begin
writeln(‘buying 50 mind’)
for i:= 1 to 5 + random(3) do
begin
Mouse(272,78,21,14,false)
Wait(150 + random(150))
x:= x -58
y:= y + 65
Mouse(x,y,39,10,true)
wait(250 + random(250))

If CountItemName(‘Coins’) < 1000 then
begin
money:= false
end else
begin
money:= true
end;
end;
end;
until(value = false or money = false)
end;

Procedure BuyFire;
begin
WriteLn(‘Starting fire routine’)
Value:= true
repeat

wait(200)
RuneValue:= Trim(GetTextAtEx(79,68,0,RuneChars,false,false,0,2,65535,4,true,tr_AllChars));
RuneValueint:= strtoint(RuneValue)
Wait(200)
If RunevalueInt > FireMin then
begin
Value:= true
end else
begin
Value:= false
end;

If value = true then
begin
writeln(‘buying 50 fire’)
for i:= 1 to 5 + random(3) do
begin
Mouse(83,78,21,14,false)
Wait(150 + random(150))
x:= x -58
y:= y + 65
Mouse(x,y,39,10,true)
wait(250 + random(250))

If CountItemName(‘Coins’) < 1000 then
begin
money:= false
end else
begin
money:= true
end;
end;
end;
until(value = false or money = false)
end;

Procedure BuyAir;
begin
WriteLn(‘Starting air routine’)
Value:= true
repeat

wait(200)
RuneValue:= Trim(GetTextAtEx(173,68,0,RuneChars,false,false,0,2,65535,4,true,tr_AllChars));
RuneValueint:= strtoint(RuneValue)
Wait(200)
If RunevalueInt > AirMin then
begin
Value:= true
end else
begin
Value:= false
end;

If value = true then
begin
writeln(‘buying 50 air’)
for i:= 1 to 5 + random(3) do
begin
Mouse(178,78,21,14,false)
Wait(150 + random(150))
x:= x -58
y:= y + 65
Mouse(x,y,39,10,true)
wait(250 + random(250))

If CountItemName(‘Coins’) < 1000 then
begin
money:= false
end else
begin
money:= true
end;
end;
end;
until(value = false or money = false)
end;

Procedure BuyChaos;
begin
WriteLn(‘Starting chaos routine’)
Value:= true
repeat

wait(200)
RuneValue:= Trim(GetTextAtEx(361,68,0,RuneChars,false,false,0,2,65535,4,true,tr_AllChars));
RuneValueint:= strtoint(RuneValue)
Wait(200)
If RunevalueInt > ChaosMin then
begin
Value:= true
end else
begin
Value:= false
end;

If value = true then
begin
writeln(‘buying 50 chaos’)
for i:= 1 to 5 + random(3) do
begin
Mouse(365,78,21,14,false)
Wait(150 + random(150))
x:= x -58
y:= y + 65
Mouse(x,y,39,10,true)
wait(250 + random(250))

If CountItemName(‘Coins’) < 1000 then
begin
money:= false
end else
begin
money:= true
end;
end;
end;
until(value = false or money = false)
end;

Procedure BuyDeath;
begin
WriteLn(‘Starting Death routine’)
Value:= true
repeat

wait(200)
RuneValue:= Trim(GetTextAtEx(408,68,0,RuneChars,false,false,0,2,65535,4,true,tr_AllChars));
RuneValueint:= strtoint(RuneValue)
Wait(200)
If RunevalueInt > DeathMin then
begin
Value:= true
end else
begin
Value:= false
end;

If value = true then
begin
writeln(‘buying 50 death’)
for i:= 1 to 5 + random(3) do
begin
Mouse(414,78,21,14,false)
Wait(150 + random(150))
x:= x -58
y:= y + 65
Mouse(x,y,39,10,true)
wait(250 + random(250))

If CountItemName(‘Coins’) < 1000 then
begin
money:= false
end else
begin
money:= true
end;
end;
end;
until(value = false or money = false)
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
money:= true
Mousespeed:= 8
benmouse:= true
z:= 139
ChatChars:= LoadChars2(AppPath + ‘CharsChat2’);
upchars:= LoadChars2(AppPath + ‘CharsRS22’);
RuneChars:= LoadChars2(AppPath + ‘CharsChat2\fontsmall’);
ServerChars:= LoadCharsFromFont2(‘Ariel’, 10, False, False, False, False);
FireMin:= 3250
MindMin:= 2250
AirMin:= 3250
WaterMin:= 3250
EarthMin:= 3250
ChaosMin:= 20
DeathMin:= 10
repeat
findwindowbysize(1281,965)
ActivateClient()
SelectWorldMenu;
SelectServer;
Login;
findwindowbysize(766,504)
ActivateClient()
ScreenSetup;
TradeBetty;
repeat
Wait(500)
Until(FindColor(x,y,2070783,447,94,480,100) = true)
BuyDeath
BuyChaos
BuyMind;
BuyFire;
BuyAir;
BuyDeath
BuyChaos
Logout;
until (money = false)
end.
[/code]

There is my old one, it needs tweaking loads i got bored halfway through the project. If anyone has the time to fix this, i can tell you an older version was making 300kp hour profit, it is by far the quickest way to make moeny on RS.

There are a million bugs with this script, mainly to do with you running a different reolution to me.

Please dont ask me to help you fix it, i have given up with this project for now.

Read full topic
